title: Bottled Passion
resume: Bottled Passion is a Hong Kong television drama produced by Television Broadcasts Limited under executive producer Lee Tim-shing. The drama premiered on Jade and HD Jade channels on 6 December 2011 and is slated to end its run on 2 January 2012 with a total of 21 episodes. The Chinese title literally translates to "My Ideal Cruel Husband", with a wordplay on the words "long4 gwan1", meaning "husband" or "pimp", and "long4", meaning "cruel" or "cunning."
